title: Scary Stories 14: Hair-raising!
description:
Our 14th annual Halloween special filled with scary true stories, spooky songs and frightful surprises.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Ron Hart, Gretchyn Nothhouse, Ryan Estrada, Brian Heath, Bernard Hermann, Bob McFadden & Dor, Larry’s Rebels, Plymouth Rock, Louis Armstrong, Taj Easton, John LaSala, Hope Brush, Jeff Barr)
